input.sentences: my friends and i decided to try this new restaurant we 've been hearing about .
the pictures on the menu look very appetizing making my decision of what to get even more difficult .
i chose a salad with corn for my appetizer .
does n't this look delicious ? ! i ca n't wait to try it .
the food was so good that i had to try one of their desserts too . the food was amazing ! i 'm sure to eat here again .
output.sentences: I love going to restaurants with my friends and hearing all their stories.
When I am choosing my food, the pictures on the menu actually make it more difficult to pick.
I settled to choose a corn salad.
The California chicken was my main order and well worth the wait.
When I was done with the main course, I still had room for deserts!
